mapper.insert: INSERT INTO address (addr_id, addr, dtl_addr, name, phone, post_num, type, def_addr, rg_date, rg_num, md_date, md_num, mem_id) VALUES (#{addr_id}, #{addr}, #{dtl_addr}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{post_num}, #{type}, #{def_addr}, #{rg_date}, #{rg_num}, #{md_date}, #{md_num}, #{mem_id})
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM address WHERE mem_id = #{mem_id}
